variantrule.name: Alternate Rule: Style Re-Training
entries: 有些格斗风格有特殊的用途。可以考虑让你游戏中的战士在几个长时间的休息中重新训练他们的格斗风格，如果他们是高等级的话，则是一个长时间的休息，以调整他们的技术。

data.name: The Alternate Fighter
entries: 在本补编中介绍的另类战斗机类可以在{@class Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Classes}页中找到。

entries.name: Warrior Archetypes
entries: 在3级的时候，战士可以选择以下最能代表他们的训练和技能的原型之一。奥术骑士，冠军，指挥官，射手，或武器大师。

items: {@class Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Master at Arms|Master at Arms|LLAF}

entries.name: Additional Warrior Archetypes
entries: 想找更多的选择吗？请看{@book Alternate Fighter: Expanded|LLAF:E}，有8个额外的原型，包括守护者、军需官和剑客!

entries.name: Alternate Archetypes
entries: Below are changes to the official Martial Archetypes so they work with the Alternate Fighter. Detailed here are the Sylvan Archer, Knight Errant, Shadowdancer, Runecarver, and Ronin.

entries.name: Where is the Psi Warrior?
entries: Looking to play an Alternate Fighter with Psionic abilities? Make sure you check out the {@book Alternate Fighter: Expanded|LLAF:E}, which includes the Mystic Archetype - a Psionic, Intelligence-based, spell point caster akin to the Arcane Knight.

data.name: Martial Exploits
entries: 以下是战士可用的漏洞。如果某项特技有一个先决条件，如最低能力值或等级，你可以在满足先决条件的同时学习它。

entries.name: 1st-Degree Exploits
entries: 一级技巧是比挥舞武器稍微复杂的小技巧。他们可以被训练有素的战士所学习，并且没有等级的前提条件。

entries.name: Additional Martial Exploits
entries: 请查看{@book Alternate Fighter: Expanded|LLAF:E}，以了解大量额外的武功秘籍，包括基于法术效果的高级武功秘籍。

entries.name: 2nd-Degree Exploits
entries: 二级技能代表了武术技能的绝对巅峰，没有经过专门的训练，也没有丰富的战斗经验，就可以达到这个程度。任何五级以上的战士都可以学习这些特技。

entries.name: 3rd-Degree Exploits
entries: 这种程度的探索只有献身于训练的精英战士才能够掌握。它们只能由9级或更高等级的战士学习。每个三阶的探索术只能在每个短时或长时休息中使用一次。

entries.name: 4th-Degree Exploits
entries: 四级技巧是只有整个王国中最强大的战士才能掌握的技巧。这些只能由13级或更高等级的战士学习。每个四级技能只能在短期或长期休息中使用一次。

entries.name: 5th-Degree Exploits
entries: 这种程度的特技是可以与半神相媲美的技能壮举。这些技能只能由17级以上的战士学习，并且每个技能只能在短期或长期休息中使用一次。

data.name: Alternate Fighter Expanded
entries: 在5e中，战士虽然在机械上是平衡的，但没有达到它试图捕捉的幻想。而{@class Alternate Fighter|LLAF}则努力捕捉扮演战斗大师的幻想。下面包括了替代斗士类的额外选项。

entries.name: Additional Fighting Styles
entries: 备用战斗机所包含的格斗风格模仿了最常见的战斗形式。这里包括的格斗术可以更有异国情调，更有特色，或对使用它们的人来说更危险。

entries.name: Advanced Martial Exploits
entries: 这里包括的探索可能比较难学，或者需要特定的大师来教。高级探索在本质上更具有幻想性，并且是基于5e中存在的法术进行平衡。

entries.name: Martial Feats
entries: 这里包括的功绩使所有玩家角色都能分享备用战士的能力。

entries.name: Additional Warrior Archetypes
entries: 以下是九种额外的原型，供战士们在第三级时选择。

data.name: Additional Fighting Styles
entries: 除了基础等级的战斗方式外，候补战士还可以使用以下战斗方式。

entries.name: Alternate Rule: Style Re-Training
entries: 一些格斗风格，特别是这里的格斗风格，在应用上是特殊的。考虑让你的游戏中的战士在几个长时间的休息中重新训练他们的战斗风格，以适应未来的挑战。

data.name: Addtional Martial Exploits
entries: 下面列出的是候补斗士可以使用的额外的武功秘籍。每当你获得一个等级，你就可以用你选择的另一个技能来取代你所知道的一个技能。

entries.name: 1st-Degree Exploits
entries: 一级技巧是比挥舞武器稍微复杂的小技巧。他们可以被训练有素的战士所学习，并且没有等级的前提条件。

entries.name: 2nd-Degree Exploits
entries: 二级技能代表了武术的绝对巅峰，是一个没有经过专门训练，或没有丰富战斗经验的战士所能达到的技能。任何五级或以上的战士都可以学习这个级别的技能。

entries.name: 3rd-Degree Exploits
entries: 这种程度的探索只有献身于训练的精英战士才能够掌握。它们只能由9级或更高等级的战士学习。每个三阶的探索术只能在每个短时或长时休息中使用一次。

entries.name: 4th-Degree Exploits
entries: 四级技能是只有整个王国中最强大的战士才能掌握的技术，这些技术只能由13级或以上的战士学习。每个四级技能只能在短时或长时休息中使用一次。

entries.name: 5th-Degree Exploits
entries: 这种程度的探索是可以与半神相媲美的技能盛宴。它们只能由17级或更高等级的战士学习，并且每一个只能在短期或长期休息中使用一次。

data.name: Martial Feats
entries: 这里的特技可以让所有的角色都能分享到替身战士的能力。如果你的游戏使用特技，可以选择这些特技来代替能力分数的提高。

data.name: Alternate Fighter Builds
entries: 另类战士等级的目标之一是将{@i Player's Handbook}中发现的战斗大师原型的多功能性带给每个战士。根据战士的原型、战斗风格和武技选择，他们可以反映流行小说和幻想中的任何战士。
下面的候补斗士构建建议了一些特殊的原型、战斗风格、武术技巧和特技组合，所有这些都是来自候补斗士、{@i Player's Handbook}或{@i Tasha's Cauldron of Everything}*。

entries.name: Blade Master
entries: 你是一个真正的刀术学生，并将你的技能专门用于单兵作战。你经常寻找你能找到的最强大的敌人，以便在他们身上测试你的技能。

rows: {@optfeature Disarm|LLAF}, {@optfeature Martial Focus|LLAF}, {@optfeature Feint|LLAF}, {@optfeature Honor Duel|LLAF}, {@optfeature Zephyr Slash|LLAF:E}

entries.name: Bodyguard
entries: 你已经接受了保护重要人物和护送珍贵货物的训练。当你在附近时，任何敌人，无论他们的力量或能力，都无法威胁到你所保护的东西。

rows: {@optfeature Disarm|LLAF}, {@optfeature First Aid|LLAF}, {@optfeature Reposition|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Warding Strike|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Shield Impact|LLAF}

entries.name: Gladiator
entries: 你是一个娱乐家，就像你是一个战士一样。角斗士通常是异国武器和战斗方式的大师，他们寻求建立自己作为奇妙的奢侈战士的声誉。

rows: {@class Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Master at Arms|Master at Arms|LLAF}
{@optfeature Disarm|LLAF}, {@optfeature Feat of Strength|LLAF}, {@optfeature Menacing Shout|LLAF}, {@optfeature Sweeping Strike|LLAF}, {@optfeature Honor Duel|LLAF}

entries.name: Knight
entries: 古典骑士寻求体现骑士精神的美德，无论是在战场上还是在战场外。他们是高贵的战士，支持他们的盟友，能够在上流社会中游刃有余。

rows: {@optfeature Brace Up|LLAF}, {@optfeature First Aid|LLAF}, {@optfeature Scholar's Insight|LLAF}, {@optfeature Skilled Rider|LLAF}, {@optfeature Heroic Will|LLAF}

entries.name: Marine
entries: 海军陆战队员是在海上或船舶甲板上受训作战的战士。他们可以是保卫珍贵货物的精英水手，也可以是无情的海盗，掠夺他们遇到的一切。

rows: {@optfeature Dirty Hit|LLAF}, {@optfeature Feat of Strength|LLAF}, {@optfeature Lightstep|LLAF}, {@optfeature Navigator's Know-How|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Improvised Skill|LLAF:E}

entries.name: Medic
entries: 医务人员是使他们的盟友保持最佳状态的大师，缓解他们的伤痛，并在战斗中保持高昂的精神状态。

rows: {@optfeature Brace Up|LLAF}, {@optfeature Feat of Strength|LLAF}, {@optfeature First Aid|LLAF}, {@optfeature Take Down|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Redirect|LLAF}, {@optfeature Shield Impact|LLAF}

entries.name: Mystic
entries: 神秘主义者是和平与繁荣的游荡守护者，他们从出生起就被培养成在战斗中挥洒他们的幻觉潜能。神秘主义者是和平主义者，只在最后关头使用暴力。

rows: {@optfeature Aristocratic Education|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Defensive Stance|LLAF}, {@optfeature Martial Focus|LLAF}, {@optfeature Heroic Will|LLAF}, {@optfeature Zephyr Slash|LLAF:E}

entries.name: Peacekeeper
entries: 维和人员经常被发现在偏远地区和其他无法无天的土地上巡逻，他们利用其精良的技能和致命的枪支准确性，在所到之处执行法律。

rows: {@optfeature Blinding Shot|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Crippling Shot|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Martial Focus|LLAF}, {@optfeature Take Down|LLAF:E}, {@optfeature Trick Shot|LLAF:E}

entries.name: Pugilist
entries: 你已经把自己的身体磨练成了一件致命的武器。当其他手无寸铁的战士依靠他们的速度进行攻击时，你利用你的原始力量对你的敌人进行毁灭性的打击。

rows: {@optfeature Brace Up|LLAF}, {@optfeature Disarm|LLAF}, {@optfeature Hurl|LLAF}, {@optfeature Feint|LLAF}, {@optfeature Mighty Thrust|LLAF}, {@optfeature Thunderous Blow|LLAF:E}

data.name: Warrior Archetypes
entries: Choose one of the following Warrior Archetypes that best represents the skill set and training of your fighter: Crusader, Guardian, Guerrilla, Hound Master, Mystic, Quartermaster, Swordsage, Tinker Knight, or Witchblade.

tools: one set of {@item artisan's tools|phb} of your choice.

default: (a) {@item chain mail|PHB} or (b) {@item leather armor|PHB}, a {@item longbow|PHB}, {@item Arrows (20)|PHB|20 arrows}
(a) {@filter martial weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} and {@item shield|PHB} or (b) two {@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}
(a) {@item light crossbow|PHB} and {@item Crossbow Bolts (20)|PHB|20 bolts} or (b) two {@item handaxe|phb|handaxes}
(a) a {@item dungeoneer's pack|PHB} or (b) an {@item explorer's pack|PHB}

fluff.name: The Fighter
entries: 年轻的卫兵悄悄地越过他的战友，从军械库的后门溜了出去，镇民们都躲在那里。那天早上，一个强盗团伙突然来到他们的村庄，他们的首领发出了一个挑战。如果镇上的战士能在单挑中战胜他，他的匪帮就会和平地离开。尽管这个年轻的人类在一个赛季前才加入镇上的卫队，但他已经可以用剑打败其他所有的卫队。令镇民们惊讶的是，他拔出了自己的剑，喃喃自语地祈祷，并站出来保卫自己的家园。
当太阳开始落山时，一个白发苍苍的侏儒在勘察敌营。她和她最好的三个士兵一起，来到敌方将军的帐篷，打算击溃军队，否则就死在这里。在一场全面的战斗中，她所指挥的小队矮人在面对这支大军时不会有任何机会。然而，如果她的这群精锐士兵严格遵守她的命令，他们就有机会在军队开战前砍掉他们的脑袋。为了这可能是她最后的任务，她握紧了战斧，下达了行动的命令。
这位张扬的精灵角斗士停顿了一小会儿，沉浸在人群的欢呼声中。他还记得他在地下竞技场的第一次角斗比赛，周围都是喝醉的海盗和奴隶主。现在，他在王国最大的大都市的喧嚣中为国王和王后表演。在品味了这一时刻后，他旋即将他的镀金长矛刺入对手的心脏，结束了这将是他最后的战斗，为他赢得了自由。

entries.name: Masters of the Battlefield
entries: 并非每个城市卫兵、雇佣兵或职业军人都被认为是真正的战士。天生具有战争的天赋和敏锐的战斗本能，一个天生的战士无法抗拒战场的召唤。斗士们来自军官、精英保镖、老牌雇佣兵和受膏者的行列，以其精湛的战斗技巧而闻名。
深入地下城，杀死怪物，以及其他在冒险者中常见的危险工作是战士的第二天性。他们内心深处的某种东西迫使他们寻找冲突，并将自己投入到冲突之中。斗士通常是公平竞争的拥护者，是忠诚的盟友。

entries.name: The Armaments of War
entries: 每个战士都能挥舞斧头，用剑锋击剑，用长剑砍倒敌人，并能高度熟练地使用弓。同样地，战士也善于使用盾牌和各种形式的盔甲。战士们挥舞着他们选择的武器和盔甲，作为他们自身的延伸，在战场上变成美丽而致命的钢铁漩涡。
虽然他们都有战斗技巧，但战士的训练性质可能大不相同。有些人培养了巨大的身体力量，用压倒性的打击粉碎他们的敌人。有些人喜欢从远处攻击，在敌人意识到他们的存在之前就将其杀死。其他人则利用战术洞察力来协调他们的盟友。还有少数人用有限但有力的奥术法术来增强他们的武术能力。

entries.name: Creating Your Fighter
entries: 当创建一个战士时，最重要的是要考虑他们从哪里获得战争武器的技能。你是一个贵族家庭的后代，从出生起就被家族中最好的战士训练？你是一个为运动而战的角斗士，被迫学习战斗或灭亡？你是白手起家，作为雇佣兵公司的一员，在剑尖上赚取食物、住所和钱财吗？
另外，考虑你的战士的战斗风格，以及你的战斗方式如何使你与其他战士区别开来。你是一个使用武器的艺术家，在战场上优雅地走动吗？你是否特别无情，陶醉于战争的混乱和杀戮？或者，你是带着荣誉和尊重去战斗，只挑战那些你认为与你旗鼓相当的人？

entries.name: Multiclassing and the Fighter
entries: 如果你的团体使用可选的多类规则，这里是你需要知道的，如果你选择在战士类中取得第一级。

entries.name: Ability Score Minimum
entries: 作为一个多类人物，你必须至少有13分的力量（或灵巧）才能在这个等级中提升等级，如果你已经是一个战士，则可以在其他等级中提升等级。

entries.name: Proficiencies
entries: 如果战士不是你的初始等级，以下是你作为战士升到第一级时获得的熟练度：轻甲、中甲、盾牌、简单武器和武术武器。

entries.name: Exploits
entries: 如果你有另一个允许你学习和执行剥削的功能，把你所有的剥削骰子加在一起变成一个池子，它们都变成你最大的剥削骰大小。然后，你可以用这些剥削骰子中的任何一个，来执行你从任何一个来源知道的任何剥削。

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: 通过这些建议，你可以迅速成为一名战士。首先，根据你想使用的武器，使你的力量（重型或近战武器）或灵巧（远程武器或双持武器）成为你的最高能力得分，其次是体质。第二，选择（%0%）的背景。

subclass.name: Master at Arms
subclassFeatures: Master at Arms|Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Master at Arms|LLAF|3
Master of Forms|Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Master at Arms|LLAF|7
Warrior of Legend|Alternate Fighter|LLAF|Master at Arms|LLAF|18

classFeature.name: Fighting Style
entries: 在1级的时候，从下面的选项中选择最能反映你的武术训练和武器技能的格斗风格。你不能多次选择一种格斗方式，即使有一项功能允许你选择额外的格斗方式。
每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以将你的格斗风格换成你选择的另一种格斗风格。

entries.name: Alternate Rule: Style Re-Training
entries: 有些格斗风格有特殊的用途。可以考虑让你游戏中的战士在几个长时间的休息中重新训练他们的格斗风格，如果他们是高等级的话，则是一个长时间的休息，以调整他们的技术。

classFeature.name: Second Wind (1)
entries: 从第一级开始，你可以使用一个额外的动作来恢复相当于（%0%）+你的战士等级的命中率。一旦你这样做了，你必须完成一个短暂或长时间的休息才能再次这样做。
当你达到这个等级的第14级时，你可以在每次短休或长休之间使用你的第二风特性两次。

classFeature.name: Second Wind (2)
entries: 在14级时，你可以在必须完成短期或长期休息之前使用你的第二风两次。

classFeature.name: Martial Exploits
entries: 二级时，你已经开始掌握独特的技术，以提高你的武术技能，无论是在战场上还是在战场外。

entries.name: Exploit Dice
entries: The Fighter table shows the number of Exploit Dice you have to perform any Exploits you know. Most Exploits require you to expend these Dice in order to use them. You can only use one Exploit per attack, ability check, or saving throw, and you regain all Exploit Dice when you finish a short or long rest.
你的剥削骰子开始时是{@dice d6}s，随着你在这个等级中的等级增加而增加，如战士表所示。

entries.name: Exploits Known
entries: 你知道两个{@filter Exploits|optionalfeatures|feature type=LL:ME}你在本课末尾的列表中选择的。斗士表中的 "已知的探索 "一栏显示了你何时学习更多你选择的探索。要学习一项探索，你必须满足它可能具有的任何先决条件，比如最低能力分数或最低战士等级。
每当你获得一个战士等级时，你可以用你选择的另一个{@filter Exploit|optionalfeatures|feature type=LL:ME}漏洞来替换你知道的一个漏洞。

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: 如果一个探索需要一个生物做拯救动作，你的探索拯救动作DC的计算方法如下。

classFeature.name: Know Your Enemy
entries: 从第三级开始，你可以用自己的技能来衡量别人的技能。作为一个行动，选择一个你能看到的60英尺内的生物。你可以了解到它在以下属性方面是否与你相等、优越或劣势。
一旦你了解了某个生物的情况，你就不能再对该生物使用这个功能，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

When you reach 14th level, you can use this feature to learn of your foe's strengths through battle. Once per turn, you can use this feature when you hit with a weapon attack, and you can use this feature to learn three things about a creature between each short or long rest.

classFeature.name: Warrior Archetype
entries: At 3rd level, choose the Warrior Archetype from the options below that best represents your skills and training: Arcane Knight, Champion, Commander, Marksman, or Master at Arms.
Also included at the end of this class are Archetypes inspired by official options for Fighters: Sylvan Archer, Knight Errant, Shadowdancer, Ronin, and Runecarver.
Your Warrior Archetype grants you features at 3rd level and again at 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th levels.

entries.name: Archetype Exploits
entries: 每个原型都有一个原型探索的列表，你可以在你的原型描述中指出的战士等级中学习。这些技能不计入你所知道的技能总数，也不能被换成其他技能。如果你不符合某项弧形攻击的先决条件，那么你可以学习它。

classFeature.name: Archetype Feature
entries: 在第7级时，你获得一个由你的战士原型授予的功能。

classFeature.name: Archetype Feature
entries: 在10级时，你获得一个由你的战士原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Archetype Feature
entries: 在15级时，你获得一个由你的战士原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Archetype Feature
entries: 在18级时，你获得一个由你的战士原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一个能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两个能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到14级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
如果你的DM允许使用功法，你可以改用（%0%）。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (1)
entries: 从5级开始，每当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以攻击两次，而不是一次。
当你在这个等级中达到一定级别时，你可以作为攻击动作的一部分进行的攻击次数增加；在11级（3次攻击）和17级（4次攻击）。

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (2)
entries: 11级时，每当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}的行动时，你可以攻击三次。

classFeature.name: Martial Superiority
entries: Your martial skill eclipses even that of professional warriors. Starting at 11th level, whenever you use your Second Wind feature you regain one of your expended Exploit Dice.
Also, you regain all Expended Exploit dice if you spend 10 minutes doing only activity that would be part of a short rest.

classFeature.name: Extra Attack (3)
entries: 17级时，每当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以攻击四次。

classFeature.name: Action Surge (1)
entries: 从6级开始，你可以突破自己的极限，哪怕只是一瞬间。在你的回合中，你可以在当前回合采取一个额外的行动。一旦你这样做了，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息才能再次使用这个功能。
当你达到20级时，你可以在每次短休或长休之间使用该功能两次，但每回合只能使用一次。

classFeature.name: Action Surge (2)
entries: 在20级时，你可以在每个短时或长时休息中使用你的行动突进功能两次，但每回合只能使用一次。

classFeature.name: Indomitable (1)
entries: 你的战斗精神使你能够从失败的边缘抓住成功。从第9级开始，当你的拯救动作失败时，你可以选择成功。一旦你使用了这个功能，你必须完成一个长时间的休息才能再次使用它。
在某些战士等级，你可以在每次长距离休息之间额外使用这个功能。从13级开始你可以使用这个功能两次，从17级开始可以使用三次。

classFeature.name: Indomitable (2)
entries: 在13级时，你可以在长时间休息之间使用不屈不挠两次。

classFeature.name: Indomitable (3)
entries: 17级时，你可以在长时间休息之间使用不屈不挠三次。

classFeature.name: Relentless
entries: At 20th level, your skills in combat are those of legend. When you roll initiative, you regain all expended Exploit Dice.
Also, if you start your turn with no Exploit Dice remaining, you immediately regain one of your expended Exploit Dice.

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Knight
entries: 奥术骑士用奥术知识来补充他们对战争武器的技能。与只研究魔法的法师相比，奥术骑士只能产生一些小的法术，但是，当与他们对战争武器的致命技能相结合时，这些小的法术就会成为强有力的增强手段。

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: 当你在3级采用奥术骑士原型时，你学会了施展小的奥术法术，就像巫师一样。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: 你从{@filter Arcane Knight spell list|spells|subclass=Alternate Fighter: Arcane Knight (LLAF)|level=0}中学习两个你选择的咒语。你在10级的时候可以额外学习一个奥术骑士的咒语。

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: 奥术骑士施法表显示了你有多少个法术槽来施展你的一级及以上的法术。要施展其中一个法术，你必须消耗一个该法术等级或更高的法术槽。当你完成一次长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有消耗的法术槽。例如，如果你知道一级法术（%0%），并且有一个一级和一个二级法术槽可用，你可以用其中一个法术槽施放（%1%）。

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: 你知道三个一级的（%0%）。 你的法术表的 "已知法术 "一栏显示你何时学会更多的1级或更高等级的法术，而这些法术的等级是你有法术槽的。
当你获得一个等级时，你可以用奥术骑士法术列表中的另一个法术替换你的一个已知法术。该法术的等级必须是你有法术槽的。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 智力是你的奥术骑士法术的施法能力。每当法术提到你的法术能力时，你就会使用智力。在为奥术骑士的法术设定蓄力DC或进行法术攻击卷时，你也会使用你的智力修改器。

subclassFeature.name: Weapon Bond
entries: 三级时，你可以用魔法将自己和你的武器结合起来。在短期或长期休息结束时，你可以触摸一件武器，在你和该武器之间建立起一种神奇的联系。
你不能被解除绑定的武器，除非你是（%0%）。如果它在同一个存在平面上，你可以使用一个额外的行动来立即将它召唤到你身边。它可以作为你的奥术骑士法术的施法焦点。
你在任何时候最多可以拥有两把绑定的武器，不过，它们必须一次召唤一个。如果你绑定了第三把武器，你就会打破与另外两把武器中的一把的绑定。

entries.name: Master Sword & Spell!
entries: 有兴趣扮演一位真正的剑与法术大师吗？请看{@link Magus Class|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-Mslo6ktmq1Yg5WTSjDQ}，圣骑士和游侠的奥术半施法者伙伴!

subclassFeature.name: War Magic
entries: You can seamlessly weave minor spells with weapon attacks. When you use your action to cast an Arcane Knight spell you can make a weapon attack as a bonus action on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Strikes
entries: 你的武器会削弱生物对你的魔法的抵抗力。从10级开始，当你用武器攻击击中一个生物时，在你的下一个回合结束前，它对你施放的法术进行的下一次蓄力攻击会处于劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Surge
entries: 从15级开始，当你使用你的行动突进时，你可以传送到你能看到的一个无人的空间，最多可以传送30英尺。你可以在额外行动之前或之后进行传送。

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Arcane Knight
entries: You expertly weave spell and sword together. When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can cast an Arcane Knight spell with a casting time of one action in place of one attack.

subclassFeature.name: Champion
entries: 冠军们放弃了所有其他形式的改进，专注于提高他们的原始体能。这些巨大的人物努力通过不懈的训练来保持最佳的身体状态。在战斗中，冠军们表现出超自然的运动能力，用他们的原始力量压倒敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Champion Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Mighty Warrior
entries: You raw physical might enhances your attacks. Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.
At 15th level, your critical hit range increases again, and you score a critical hit on a roll of 18-20 on the d20.

subclassFeature.name: Remarkable Strength
entries: You easily perform feats of raw strength and endurance that would seem impossible. Whenever you make a Strength or Constitution ability check or saving throw you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Peak Athlete
entries: You easily perform Your physical abilities are peerless. You gain a climbing and swimming speed equal to your walking speed, and when you use Second Wind you gain the benefits of the Dash action.eats of raw strength and endurance that would seem impossible. Whenever you make a Strength or Constitution ability check or saving throw you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Devastating Critical
entries: Whenever you score a critical hit with a weapon attack you can deal additional damage equal to your Fighter level.
At 15th level, when you score a critical hit with a weapon attack, you can maximize the damage instead of rolling. Once you do you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Champion
entries: 你是一个近乎完美的身体活力的标本，并且已经变得非常难以杀死。从18级开始，如果你在开始的回合中剩余一半或更少的命中率，你会重新获得相当于5+你体质修正值的命中率。
如果你的命中率为0，你不会重新获得任何命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Commander
entries: 并非所有的战士在战斗中都只依靠自己，有些人利用他们对战场战术的深刻了解来协调他们的盟友。指挥官是在战斗前线领导的战士，他们发布命令，并通过自己的英勇事迹激发他人的伟大精神。通过他们的存在，指挥官可以将一个没有组织的民兵变成一支致命的战斗力量。

subclassFeature.name: Commander Exploits
entries: 你可以从下表中注明的战士等级中学习某些战术性的探索（%0%）。它们不计入你已知的策略总数。每当你获得一个等级时，你可以用你选择的战术探索来替换你从这个功能中学到的一个探索。

If a Tactical Exploit has a warlord level prerequisite, you can learn it if your fighter level meets that prerequisite. Some Tactical Exploits require a Leadership modifier. Choose either Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma to be your Leadership modifier for these Exploits.

subclassFeature.name: Student of War
entries: You have studied the strategy of both politics and war. You gain proficiency in either History, Insight, or Persuasion, and whenever you make an ability check with that skill you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Strategic Command
entries: You can organize your allies even as you fight. When you use Second Wind, you can choose up to three creatures within 30 feet that can see or hear you to regain hit points equal to one roll of your Exploit Die + your Leadership modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Heroic Surge
entries: When you use Action Surge, you can choose another creature within 30 feet that can see or hear you. It can use its reaction to move up to its full speed without provoking opportunity attacks and then make a single weapon attack.
At 18th level, you can target two creatures with this feature.

subclassFeature.name: Inspiring Commands
entries: Once per turn when you use a Tactical Exploit that targets at least one friendly creature, one target of your choice gains temporary hit points equal to your Leadership modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Marksman
entries: 虽然所有的战士都学会了拉弓或投掷标枪，但那些训练成神射手的人则致力于掌握各种类型的远程武器。通常情况下，他们的致命技能是以一种明确无误的豪迈和不可动摇的信心为支撑的。依靠他们与生俱来的天赋和标志性的勇气，很少有真正的神枪手不能克服的挑战。

entries.name: Gunpowder & Firearms
entries: 如果你的游戏包括火器和火药，而且你的神枪手已经接触过这种武器的操作，那么他们就能熟练使用这些武器。

subclassFeature.name: Marksman Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Elite Training
entries: 你的训练增强了你的反应速度。从第3级开始，当你进行灵巧检查或蓄力投掷时，你可以消耗一个探索模子并将其加入你的卷轴。你可以在掷骰子之后，但在你知道你是成功还是失败之前这么做。

subclassFeature.name: Marksman's Focus
entries: You can quiet your body to fire with deadly accuracy. When you begin your turn and are not surprised or incapacitated, you can choose to enter a state of Focus, which imposes the following benefits and effects until the end of your turn:

items: 你的速度被降低到0英尺。
在你用远程武器攻击击中一个生物之前，你在所有的远程武器攻击卷上都有优势。
当你用远程武器进行攻击时，你在伤害模子上掷出1或2，你可以重新掷出模子。你必须使用这个新卷，即使新卷是1或2。

subclassFeature.name: Cunning Shot
entries: 你对危险的反应一触即发。从第7级开始，你在你的主动权卷中加入你的熟练度加成。
你还学会了识别和利用敌人防御中最微小的薄弱点。你用远程武器的攻击无视对穿刺伤害的抵抗。

subclassFeature.name: Reposition
entries: 从10级开始，当你使用你的第二风时，你的速度会增加10英尺，任何针对你的机会攻击都是不利的，直到你的回合结束。

subclassFeature.name: Reliable Shot
entries: You make even impossible shots with ease. Your normal and long range for ranged weapon attacks increases by a number of feet equal to 10 times your Fighter level.
Also, once per turn, when you have advantage on a ranged weapon attack, you can forgo advantage and make one additional ranged weapon attack against it.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Marksman
entries: Your marksmanship is supernaturally accurate. When you Focus, the benefits last for 1 minute, and you have advantage on all ranged weapon attacks for the duration. Finally, your speed is only reduced to 10 feet. At the start of your turn you can end your Focus (no action required).

subclassFeature.name: Master at Arms
entries: 虽然大多数战士掌握一种特定的武术学科，但武器大师是罕见的能够真正掌握多种战斗风格的战士。无论是通过勇气、奉献精神还是非凡的技巧，这些精英战士都会尽其所能地学习战斗的理论。武器大师总是在寻找一种新的武器或战斗风格来掌握。

subclassFeature.name: Advanced Technique
entries: Your ability to learn and execute martial techniques exceeds that of most other warriors and even other trained Fighters. You gain the following benefits to your Fighter features:

entries.name: Exploits
entries: You learn two 1st-degree Martial Exploits of your choice from the list at the end of this class. These Exploits do not count against your total number of Exploits Known.
You learn additional Martial Exploits following the same rules at certain levels: at 5th level you learn two 2nd-degree Exploits, and at 9th level you learn one 3rd-degree Exploit.

entries.name: Exploit Dice
entries: Your total number of Exploit Dice increases by 1, and all of your Exploit Dice increase to become d8s.
At certain Fighter levels your Exploit Dice increase again; at 5th level they are d10s, and at 11th level they are d12s.

entries.name: Fighting Styles
entries: You learn one additional Fighting Style of your choice from those available to the Fighter. However, you can only benefit from one Fighting Style that you gained from the Fighter Class or this Master at Arms feature at a time.
As a bonus action, you can switch your current Fighting Style for another Fighter Fighting Style that you know.
你在7级的时候可以额外学习一种你选择的格斗术，当你在这个等级达到15级的时候可以再次学习。你仍然一次只能从一种格斗风格中受益。

subclassFeature.name: Master of Forms
entries: Your skill allows you to learn exotic techniques from a variety of disciplines. You learn two Exploits of your choice from any class. If the Exploits have a prerequisite level, you can learn them as long as your Fighter level meets that prerequisite.
Any Exploit that you learn through this feature does not count against your total number of Exploits Known.
你在15级时从任何类别中额外学习一项剥削，并在18级时学习最后一项剥削。

entries.name: Advanced Martial Classes
entries: {@i Master of Forms}参考从任何等级学习漏洞。除了候补战士之外，目前还有两个班级使用 "漏洞"。

items: 备用战斗机。展开 - {@book Found Here|LLAF:E|0|Alternate Fighter:Expanded}

subclassFeature.name: Masterful Surge
entries: 在非常需要的时候，你可以利用你的技术作为条件反射。从10级开始，当你使用你的行动突进时，你会获得一个单一的剥削模子，这个模子必须作为行动突进赋予你的额外行动的一部分来使用。如果不使用，它将在你的额外行动结束时消失。
此外，你可以同时从你知道的两种格斗术中获益。不过，每次奖励行动你只能切换一种。

subclassFeature.name: Warrior of Legend
entries: Your mastery of the weapons of war is near-supernatural. Once per turn when you use an Exploit in combat, you can roll a d6 in place of expending an Exploit Die.
Also, over the course of 1 hour, which can be during a short or long rest, you can practice your techniques to replace one Exploit you know with a Martial Exploit of the same degree.

subclassFeature.name: Sylvan Archer
entries: Originally hailing from the elder forests of the world, Fighters who train to become Sylvan Archers learn to enchant arrows with ancient elven magics. Traditionally, these warriors serve as guardians of places of great natural power, but they have been known to train worth outsiders in their signature magic.

subclassFeature.name: Sylvan Archer Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Sylvan Lore
entries: You are learned in the Sylvan arts. You learn to speak, read, and write Sylvan, the ancient language of forests. You also gain proficiency in Nature. You can make Wisdom (Nature) check in place of the normal Intelligence (Nature) checks.
Finally, you learn the druidcraft cantrip, and Wisdom is your spellcasting modifier for it. When you cast druidcraft you can use a piece of ammunition as a spellcasting focus.

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Arrows
entries: You have learned to enchant arrows and other ammunition with elder Sylvan magic. You gain the benefits listed below:

entries.name: Shots Known
entries: You learn two {@filter Enchanted Shots|optionalfeatures|feature type=LL:ASA} of your choice from the list at the end of this Archetype description. You learn one additional Enchanted Shot of your choice when you reach 7th, 10th, 15th and 18th level in this class.
When you gain a level in this class you can replace one of the Shots you know with another Shot of your choice.

entries.name: Enchanting a Shot
entries: Whenever you hit a creature with a ranged weapon attack, you can magically apply the effects of one Enchanted Shot you know as part of that attack.

You can use a number of Enchanted Shots equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of 1). You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. If you have no uses left, you can expend an Exploit Die to use one of your Shots again.

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: You can use a number of EnchIf one of your Enchanted Shots forces a creature to make a saving throw or an ability check, it makes its roll against your Exploit save DC.

subclassFeature.name: Sylvan Shot
entries: You weave small amounts of magic into every shot you take. Your ranged weapon attacks count as magical for the sake of overcoming resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

Moreover, once per turn when you make a ranged weapon attack and miss, you can use your reaction to curve that shot and repeat the attack with the same ammunition against another target of your choice within range of that weapon.

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Quiver
entries: You can conjure ammunition for your favored weapons from thin air. Whenever you make a ranged weapon attack you can conjure a piece of magical ammunition as part of the attack. After the attack, hit or miss, this ammunition vanishes.
In addition, when you have no uses of your Enchanted Shot remaining, you can expend an Exploit Die to use it again.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Sylvan Archer
entries: The power of your enchantments rivals that of the eldest elves. When you use an Enchanted Shot it deals additional force damage equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

Also, you can overload one of your Enchanted Shots with overwhelming magic. When you use an Enchanted Shot you can empower it, causing creatures of your choice within 20 feet to suffer the effects of the Shot along with the target.
Once you empower an Enchanted Shot in this way you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: Knight Errant
entries: Often raised at court or in the upper circles of the nobility, the archetypal Knight Errant is a chivalric warrior of the highest order. They excel at mounted combat and wander the world in search of adventure and opportunities for heroism. These paragons of virtue are bound to defend the weak and weary.

subclassFeature.name: Knight Errant Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Chivalric Mark
entries: You punish any foe who attacks those under your protection. Once per turn when you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can Mark it until the end of your next turn. While Marked, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you, so long as you are within 10 feet of it.

If your Mark deals damage to a creature other than you, you can use your reaction to make a melee weapon attack against it. As part of this reaction you can expend an Exploit Die to grant yourself advantage on the attack roll, and on hit, you deal bonus damage equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Courtly Pedigree
entries: You have been tutored in the traditional skills of the nobility and the chivalric virtues. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: You learn to speak, read, and write one extra language.
You gain proficiency in your choice of Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.
If you are mounted, you cannot be knocked from a trained mount against your will unless you or the mount are incapacitated.
It only costs you 5 feet of movement to mount or dismount a creature, rather than half of your movement speed.

subclassFeature.name: Noble Guardian
entries: You have trained to defend yourself, your mount, and most importantly, your allies from harm. You gain the Protector Fighting Style, and whenever you use the reaction you can add one roll of your Exploit Die to the target's Armor Class instead of your normal proficiency bonus. If the triggering attack still hits, you can expend an Exploit Die to grant the target resistance to the damage of the attack.
If you already have the Protector Fighting Style you gain an additional Fighting Style of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Unyielding Knight
entries: No one can move past you without your approval. Creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you whenever they move while within the reach of a weapon you are wielding. Also, whenever you hit a creature with an opportunity attack its speed is reduced to 0 until the beginning of its next turn.
Finally, you can use the {@optfeature skilled rider|LLAF} exploit at will without expending an Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Perilous Charge
entries: You run down your foes, mounted or on foot. Once per turn, when you move 10 feet in a straight line then hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If you are mounted, the creature has disadvantage on this saving throw.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Knight Errant
entries: You will defend your allies against any foe. You gain a special reaction that you can take once during every turn, but you can only use this special reaction for an opportunity attack or your Protector Fighting Style reaction.
Moreover, if you are riding a trained mount and it takes damage, you can choose to take that damage in its place.

subclassFeature.name: Ronin
entries: Though they have been known by many names over the ages, Ronin are Fighters who have been expelled from the service of their original lord or land. Regardless of the reason, these highly skilled warriors now roam the wild seeking absolution through battle. With nothing left to lose, these warriors fight with a deadly ferocity and ruthless focus unlike any other.

subclassFeature.name: Ronin Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Exiled Courtier
entries: You were once an influential member of a noble court or an important advisor. You learn to speak, read, and write one additional language of your choice and gain proficiency in either History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.

subclassFeature.name: Unyielding Spirit
entries: You fight with the unrivaled focus and ruthless ferocity of a warrior with nothing left to lose. As a bonus action, you can focus yourself to gain advantage on all weapon attack rolls and ignore any levels of exhaustion you have until the end of your current turn. When you use this bonus action you also gain temporary hit points equal to your Fighter level.

Once you use this bonus action to focus yourself you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. When you have no uses remaining you can use this feature again, but you gain one level of exhaustion at the end of that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Lordly Bearing
entries: Your experience and former station shine through no matter how downtrodden you may become. Whenever you make an ability check with your skill gained from Exiled Courtier, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.
You also gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws. If you are already proficient in Wisdom saving throws, you instead gain proficiency in Charisma or Intelligence saving throws.

subclassFeature.name: Unrelenting
entries: You are able to push through adversity that would defeat a lesser warrior. When you roll initiative with no uses of your Unyielding Spirit feature remaining, you regain one use.
Moreover, whenever you use your Second Wind feature, your current level of exhaustion, if any, is reduced by 1.

subclassFeature.name: Swift Strikes
entries: You rain blows down upon foes like raindrops in a storm. Once per turn when you have advantage on a weapon attack roll against a creature, you can forgo your advantage to make one additional weapon attack against that creature.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Ronin
entries: Your battle focus is so absolute that you can avoid the grasp of death itself, if only for a short time. When you are reduced to 0 hit points, you can immediately take an extra turn.

During this extra turn, you remain at 0 hit points, and any damage you take causes you death saving throw failures as normal. At the end of this extra turn, you immediately fall to the ground unconscious with 0 hit points, and if you gained three death saving throw failures during that turn, you die.
Once you use this feature you must complete a long rest before you can use it again. If you have no uses left, you can expend a use of Action Surge to use this feature again.

subclassFeature.name: Shadowdancer
entries: The energies of the Shadowfell grant many strange and dark abilities to those who can wield them. The Fighters known as Shadowdancers learn to draw these sinister powers through themselves to create an exact copy of their bodies in combat.

subclassFeature.name: Shadowdancer Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Conjure Shade
entries: As a bonus action, you can draw on the umbral power of the Shadowfell to conjure a Shade in an unoccupied space you can see within 15 feet. This Shade is a magical copy of you created from shadow that uses the Shade stat block below. Though it resembles you, it has no personality of its own.

The Shade shares your turn in combat, but it cannot act on its own. You can telepathically command it to move up to its speed your turn, but if you end your turn and your Shade is more than 30 feet away from you it is instantly destroyed.

Whenever you take the Attack action, you can choose for each individual attack to originate for you, or your Shade. If you attack from your Shade, you make the attack as if you were in its space, with all of your benefits to that attack.
Your Shade lasts until it is destroyed, or you use your bonus action to dismiss it, or you conjure another Shade.

subclassFeature.name: Dance of Shadows
entries: You and your Shade dance about in a blur of shadow. If your Shade is within 30 feet of you, you can use a bonus action to switch places with it without provoking opportunity attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Shade Strike
entries: Your connection to shadow magic has grown, empowering your Shades. Immediately after you use Dance of Shadows you can make a single weapon attack from either you or the space of your Shade, as par to of the same bonus action.

You can make this bonus attack a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest. When you have no uses left, you can expend an Exploit Die as part of Dance of Shadows to make this bonus attack again.

subclassFeature.name: Umbral Voyage
entries: As an action, you can experience the world through your Shades senses. When you do so, you are blind and deaf to your own surroundings, but your Shade can move up to 1 mile away from you without being instantly destroyed.
This effect lasts for 10 minutes, but it ends early if your Shade is destroyed. or you use your bonus action to end it.

subclassFeature.name: Dark Sacrifice
entries: When a creature within 10 feet of your Shade is hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to cause your Shade to intercept the attack, reducing the damage that the target would take by an amount equal to your Fighter level.

subclassFeature.name: Restorative Shadows
entries: You can draw some of the power of your destroyed Shades back to you. If your Shade is destroyed by damage, you can use your reaction to gain temporary hit points equal to one roll of your Exploit Die + your Charisma modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Shadowdancer
entries: Your command over the shadow magic you use is unrivaled. Whenever you conjure a Shade, you can choose to conjure two Shades, without expending any additional resources.

subclassFeature.name: Runecarver
entries: Before the mortal races rose to power, the world was ruled by giants and their powerful Rune magic. Traces of this ancient magic can still be found in the wild and remote places of the world, and Fighters who learn to use the power of Runes to augment combat ability become known as Runecarvers.

subclassFeature.name: Rune Carving
entries: You have learned the ancient art of carving Runes. You learn to speak, read, and write Giant, the language of your Runes, and you gain proficiency with calligrapher's supplies. Your knowledge of Runes also grants you the benefits below:

entries.name: Runes Known
entries: You learn two Runes of your choice from the list at the end of this Archetype. Some Runes have a Fighter level prerequisite, which you can learn as soon as you reach that Fighter level. You learn one additional Rune of your choice when you reach 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level in this class.
When you gain a level in this class you can replace one of the Runes you know with another Rune of your choice.

entries.name: Inscribing a Rune
entries: Over the course of 1 hour, which can be during a short or long rest, you can use your calligrapher's supplies to inscribe a Rune you know into a weapon, suit of armor, or another object you can wear or hold. While wearing or wielding that object you gain the benefits of that Rune.
Each Rune can only be inscribed in one object. Inscribing it into another object dispels any previous inscriptions.

entries.name: Invoking a Rune
entries: While you are wearing or wielding an object inscribed with a Rune you can invoke its effect. Once invoked, a Rune cannot be invoked again until you complete a short or long rest. Only you can invoke your Runes.

entries.name: Runic Exploits
entries: Any Exploits you learn from your Runes do not count against your number of Exploits Known, and you can use them at will without expending an Exploit Die.

entries.name: Saving Throws
entries: If a Rune requires a creature to make a saving throw, it does so against your Exploit save DC.

subclassFeature.name: Runic Might
entries: As a bonus action, you can empower your body with Runic Might, granting you the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: You and anything you are wearing grows to become Large in size, so long as there is room for you to grow.
Once per turn when you make a Strength-based ability check, saving throw, or a weapon damage roll you gain a bonus to the roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

entries: You can empower yourself in this way a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Runic Ward
entries: You can shield your allies with the stalwart magic of Runes. When a target you can see within 30 feet is hit by an attack, you can use your reaction to add your Constitution modifier (minimum of +1) to its Armor Class against that attack.
You can use this reaction a number of times equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Unyielding
entries: The elder magic of the giants has caused physical changes. You have advantage on saving throws to resist being moved against your will, knocked prone, poisoned, or stunned.

subclassFeature.name: Ancient Insight
entries: Your understanding of the ancient magic of Runes has grown deeper. When you have no uses of a Rune remaining you can expend one Exploit Die to invoke that Rune again.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Runecarver
entries: When you use Runic Might, you can become Huge, so long as there is room for you to grow. While Huge, your reach increases by 5 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Crusader
entries: 许多战士向战斗和战争之神宣誓，但并不是所有的人都受到圣骑士或牧师的神圣力量的祝福。那些没有得到神明明确祝福而为之战斗的人被称为十字军战士。这些狂热者是神圣事业的拥护者，他们狂热的信仰助长了他们的战斗怒火。
十字军为许多神和事业服务，但他们都有一个共同点；他们对他们认为正确的事情的狂热奉献。他们的信念是在奉献的烈火中锻造出来的，一个专心致志的十字军战士往往宁折不弯。

entries.name: Optional Rule: Oathbreaker Paladin
entries: 如果一个圣骑士在你的游戏中违背或放弃了他们的誓言，这里的十字军原型可以用来代表一个失去神力的圣骑士。

subclassFeature.name: Crusader Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Crusader's Ire
entries: 你给你的敌人做标记以接受神的审判。作为一个额外的行动，你可以将60英尺内的生物标记为你的十字军之怒的目标，给予你以下好处。

items: 每回合一次，当你用武器攻击错过该生物时，你可以立即用同一武器对该生物进行另一次武器攻击。
当该生物在你触手可及的范围内，对除你以外的生物施法或进行攻击时，你可以用你的反应来进行机会攻击。
当该生物迫使你做出拯救动作时，你会在你的投掷动作上获得与你的探索模子相等的奖励。

entries: 你的印记会持续1分钟，或者直到生物被杀死。一旦你使用了这个特性，你必须完成一个长时间的休息才能再次使用它。当你没有剩余的使用次数时，你可以消耗一个探索模子来再次使用这个特性。

subclassFeature.name: Fanatical Disciple
entries: You gain proficiency in Religion, and whenever you make an Intelligence (Religion) check related to your god or cause, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Renewed Fervor
entries: 你的狂热赋予你在战斗中爆发的狂热。当你使用 "第二风 "时，你会重新获得 "十字军之怒 "的使用权。
此外，当你标记一个生物为你的十字军之爱的目标时，你可以向它移动30英尺，作为同一个额外行动的一部分，而不需要消耗你的移动力。

subclassFeature.name: Zealous Fury
entries: 你的信念使你能够在那些会杀死较低信仰的人的打击中幸存下来。当你的命中率降至0但没有被直接杀死时，你可以降至1个命中率，并立即对你的攻击者进行一次武器攻击。
一旦你使用这个功能，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息才能再次使用它。如果你没有剩余的使用次数，你可以再次使用它，但你会立即获得（%0%）的等级。

subclassFeature.name: Righteous Judgment
entries: 你是神怒的仲裁者。当你用武器攻击击中 "十字军之爱 "的目标时，你可以结束标记，让你的攻击造成最大伤害而不是滚动。
如果攻击将目标的命中率降至0，你会立即恢复十字军之怒的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Crusader
entries: 当 "十字军之爱 "的目标以你为攻击对象时，你可以使用你的反应来对该生物进行一次武器攻击。如果你在攻击击中你之后使用这个反应，你的武器攻击是以优势进行的。

subclassFeature.name: Guardian
entries: 守护者是精锐的防御性战士，他们的优势在与盟友并肩作战时大放异彩。虽然接受过使用各种类型武器的训练，但当使用武器和盾牌的保护性战斗方式时，守护者尤其有效。单独作战时，守护者的威胁很小，但当他们与盟友并肩作战时，他们就是不可逾越的钢铁之墙。

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Warrior Smith
entries: 你获得了维护你的武器和盔甲的技能，这样你就可以尽你最大的能力保护你的盟友。你获得对（%0%）和（%1%）的熟练程度。
在长期休息期间，你可以花1小时使用任何一套工具来强化你所接触的盾牌或一套盔甲。该物品会给予穿戴者额外的+1护甲等级加成，持续到你下次长休结束。

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Stance
entries: 当你挥舞着{@item shield|phb}时，你可以使用一个额外的动作进入一个持续时间无限的守护姿态。如果你失去能力，你脱下你的盾牌，或者你以自由行动结束它，它就会结束。你的姿态赋予你以下特征。

items: 你所选择的5英尺范围内的生物，如果也挥舞着盾牌，就会获得他们的护甲等级+1的奖励。
作为反应，当你周围5英尺内的生物被攻击击中时，你可以成为该攻击的目标，如果该攻击会击中你，你会承受该攻击的伤害。
你可以进行一次{@action Shove}的攻击作为奖励动作。

subclassFeature.name: Rallying Wind
entries: 你激励你的盟友不畏艰险，坚守阵地。当你在守护者姿态下使用 "第二风 "时，在你周围5英尺范围内能看到或听到你的生物会获得与你的战士等级相等的临时攻击点。

subclassFeature.name: Stalwart Defender
entries: 当你和你的盟友并肩站在一起，并肩站在盾牌上时，你是最强大的。你会获得以下好处。

items: 在你周围5英尺范围内，每一个挥舞着{@item shield|PHB}的友好生物，你都会获得一个+1的护甲等级奖励。
在有意识的情况下，你不能违背自己的意愿被移动。
你和你周围5英尺内的友好生物，在力量和体质方面都有优势。
当你掷出主动权时，只要你不感到惊讶，你就可以立即进入你的守护姿态。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Stance
entries: You gain proficiency in ReligioYou improve your defensive technique to better defend those who stand beside you. The range of your Guardian Stance, and all its features, now extends to creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you. Moreover, your Guardian Stance grants creatures half cover, in place of the +1 bonus to Armor Class.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Guardian
entries: You are a master Guardian and a near-supernatural shield to defend the weak. The range of all your Guardian Stance and its features include creatures of your choice within 15 feet of you.

subclassFeature.name: Guerrilla
entries: 无论什么任务，游击队员都会以最完美的方式执行。有时也被称为突击队，这些战士的特点是决心和适应性强。无论是恶劣的地形、凶恶的怪物、敌人的士兵，还是强大的施法者，没有什么能让游击队战士的意志力在追求他们的目标时动摇。

subclassFeature.name: Adaptable Warrior
entries: You can adjust your skills to meet any challenge. Over the course of 1 hour, which can be during a short or long rest, you can practice new techniques and forms to replace one Martial Exploit you know with another Martial Exploit of your choice, for which you meet its prerequisites.

subclassFeature.name: Guerrilla Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。这些技能不计入你已知的技能总数，也不能在获得等级后转换，或通过使用你的适应性技能功能来转换。

subclassFeature.name: Survivalist
entries: You are an expert at overcoming natural obstacles. You gain proficiency in two of the skills below: Athletics, Perception, Stealth, or Survival. If you are already proficient in that skill, then whenever you make an ability check with that skill you gain a bonus to the roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.
When you reach 7th level, you can choose two more skills from the list above to gain these benefits.

subclassFeature.name: By Land or Sea
entries: You have trained to find success in any environment, either it be land, sea, or sky. You gain the benefits listed below:

items: You gain a climbing speed and swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
When you fall, you can use your reaction to reduce any falling damage you would take by your Fighter level.
You can hold your breath for up to 1 hour underwater.
You ignore the effects of nonmagical difficult terrain.

subclassFeature.name: Adaptable Fighting Style
entries: You can adapt your style of fighting to better counter your enemies. Over the course of 1 hour, which can be during a short or long rest, you can replace one Fighting Style you know with another Fighter Fighting Style of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Unwavering
entries: 你是非常坚韧的，即使与其他战士相比也是如此。当你使用 "第二风 "时，你会获得以下好处。

items: 你重新获得你所消耗的一个剥削骰子。
你的（%0%）等级，如果有的话，会减少1。
你在下一分钟内进行的下一次力量、灵巧或体质检查或自救动作会获得与你的探索模子相等的奖励。

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Guerrilla
entries: 如果你有时间准备，没有什么可以阻挡你和你的目标。你可以在每次短期或长期休息结束时使用你的适应性战斗风格功能。
此外，当你掷出主动权而不是{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}时，你会获得你所选择的下列好处之一。

items: 你获得与你的战士等级相等的临时命中率。
你可以立即提升到你的全速。

subclassFeature.name: Hound Master
entries: 自人类文明诞生以来，野兽就与凡人一起工作。这些被驯化的动物中最引人注目的是狗。最早的猎人与这些忠诚的野兽协同工作，分享食物和火。一些战士仍然继承了这一衣钵，并训练（%0%）在它们身边冒险。

entries.name: Loyal Hounds & Other Canines
entries: 根据你的桌子和游戏设置，有很多生物可以成为忠诚的猎犬。
在一个更平凡的或低魔法的环境中，你的猎犬很可能是一只狗或狼。
在其他更幻想的游戏中，任何四条腿的野兽或怪兽都可以作为忠诚的猎犬。

subclassFeature.name: Hound Master Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Loyal Hound
entries: When you adopt this Archetype, you complete the training of a {@creature Loyal Hound|LLAF:E}. Your Hound is friendly to you and your allies and obeys your commands. It uses the Loyal Hound stat block, which uses your proficiency bonus (PB) and Exploit save DC.

In combat, your Hound acts during your turn. It can move and use its reaction on its own, but it only takes the Dodge action unless you use a bonus action to command it to take an action from its stat block, or another action. Also, when you take the Attack action on your turn, you can forgo one of your attacks to order your Hound to make a Bite or Maul attack. If you are incapacitated, your Hound can act on its own and it will defend both you and itself to the best of its abilities.

If your Hound is reduced to 0 hit points, it makes death saving throws like a player character would. Should it die, your skills allow you to find a canine-like creature and train it as a {@creature Loyal Hound|LLAF:E} over the course of a long rest, at which point, that creature uses the Loyal Hound stat block.

subclassFeature.name: Iron Jaws
entries: 你的猎犬被注入了一部分你自己的英雄战斗精神。你的忠诚猎犬的咬合和猛击攻击无视对非魔法穿刺和砍击伤害的抵抗。
此外，任何比你的猎犬小一号的生物在抵抗猎犬的力量投掷上都有劣势（%0%）。

subclassFeature.name: Steadfast Companion
entries: 你可以面对任何敌人，只要你的猎犬在你身边。只要你的猎犬在30英尺范围内，并能看到或听到你，它被迫做出的任何拯救动作都有优势。
Also, whenever you use Second Wind, your Loyal Hound also regains hit points equal to 1d10 + your Fighter level so long as it is within 30 feet and can see or hear you.

subclassFeature.name: Canine Fury
entries: 你的命令激发了狂野的怒火。每当你命令你的忠诚猎犬采取{@action Attack}的行动时，它可以进行两次大锤攻击，或者一次大锤攻击和一次咬人攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Hound of Legend
entries: 由于你的训练，你的猎犬已经可以和传说中的伟大野兽相媲美。当你使用 "行动激增 "时，你的猎犬在该回合也会获得一个额外的行动。
此外，你的忠诚猎犬的力量和灵巧得分都变成了18分，从而使它的咬合和猛力攻击的命中率和伤害都增加了+2。

subclassFeature.name: Mystic
entries: Where most Fighters look to increase their physical abilities, those known as Mystics work to unlock the psionic potential of their mind. Drawing upon wondrous inner power, these ascetic warriors can perform feats that would be impossible through strength alone. Where others strive for physical victory in battle, Mystics strive for spiritual enlightenment.

entries.name: Unleash your Psionic Potential
entries: The Mystic Archetype presented here is a replacement for the Psi Knight publshed in Tasha's Cauldron of Everything. As the Eldritch Knight is to the wizard, so the Mystic Knight it to the {@link Psion|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-MPkCSxSj0OETiEd3Pyf}.

subclassFeature.name: Psionics
entries: 你已经释放了你心灵的真正潜力，并且学会了显化法术，就像真正的（%0%）一样。

entries.name: Psi Points
entries: The potential of your mind is represented by a pool of Psi Points. The Mystic Psionics table on the following page shows how many Psi Points you have to manifest your spells of 1st-level and higher. To manifest a spell, you expend Psi Points equal to the spell's level (0 for cantrips). You regain all expended Psi Points when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Mental Limit
entries: Your Fighter level limits the potency of spells you can psionically manifest. This limit is reflected in the Mental Limit column of the Mystic Psionics Table.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You learn two 1st-level spells of your choice from the {@link psion spell list|https://www.gmbinder.com/share/-MPkCSxSj0OETiEd3Pyf}. The Spells Known column of the Mystic Psionics table shows when you learn more Psion spells of 1st-level or higher. Your spells must be of a level equal to your Mental Limit or lower.
Whenever you gain a Fighter level, you can choose one of the Psion spells you know and replace it with a Psion spell of your choice, of a level equal to your Mental Limit or lower.

entries.name: Spellcasting Focus
entries: Your mind itself is your spellcasting focus for your Psion spells. You must have at least one free hand to cast spells with somatic or material components, and you must provide material components that are consumed by the spell or have a required gold cost. When you manifest a spell with your psionics, you exhibit noticeable changes.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your Psion spells. You use Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. You also use your Intelligence modifier when setting the saving throw DC or making a spell attack roll for a Psion spell you know.

subclassFeature.name: Minor Telekinesis
entries: You can move objects with pure psionic power. You learn the {@spell mage hand} spell, and when you manifest it you do not need to provide the verbal or the somatic components. Your mage hand is invisible, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to 10 times your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 10 pounds).

subclassFeature.name: Mystic Exploits
entries: You enhance your techniques with psionic power. When an Exploit would use your Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution, you can choose to use your Intelligence instead.
Also, once per turn when you damage a creature with a Martial Exploit you know, you can choose for the Exploit to deal psychic damage in place of its normal damage type.

subclassFeature.name: Phase Step
entries: When you use Second Wind, you also gain the benefits of the Dash action and partially discorporate. Until the end of your current turn, you can move through solid nonmagical objects and creatures as if they were difficult terrain.
If you end your movement inside an object or creature, you are instantly shunted to the nearest unoccupied space, taking 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet you are forced to move.

subclassFeature.name: Inscrutable Mind
entries: The vast power of your mind makes you difficult for others to dominate. You have advantage on saving throws to resist being charmed, frightened, or having your thoughts read.

Also, whenever you succeed on an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw, you can spend 1 Psi Point to force the attacker to make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, it takes psychic damage equal to your Fighter level.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Ward
entries: You can project psionic power to defend allied minds. As a bonus action, you can spend 5 Psi Points to project a Psionic Ward which emanates out from you in a 30-foot radius for 1 minute. You, and creatures of your choice within range gain resistance to psychic damage and can add your Intelligence modifier (minimum of +1) to any Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws that you are forced to make.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Mystic
entries: You have unlocked the full potential of your mind. You learn the telekinesis spell, but it does not count against your total number of Spells Known. You can manifest this spell once, without expending any Psi Points.
Once you manifest telekinesis in this way, you must finish a long rest before you can manifest it again. If you have no uses left, you can expend 5 Psi Points to manifest this spell again.
Finally, when you use Phase Step, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed until the end of that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Quartermaster
entries: 每个成功的冒险家都知道团队合作的价值，但没有人比那些被称为四分卫的人更重视它。这些支持性的战士努力帮助他们的盟友发挥他们的全部潜力。他们总是把同伴的需要放在自己的需要之前，用新鲜的口粮和援助之手使他们的团队保持最佳状态。

subclassFeature.name: Down to Earth
entries: 你获得对（%0%）、（%1%）和（%2%）的熟练度。每当你进行能力检定时，使用你通过此功能获得的某项专长时，你的检定结果会得到与你的探索模子相等的奖励。

subclassFeature.name: Quartermaster Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Rations
entries: You are able to prepare potent morsels of food that keep your allies in peak condition. At the end of a long rest, you can use cook's utensils to prepare a number of Rations equal to your Constitution modifier from the list at the end of this subclass.
作为一个额外动作，你可以吃一个准备好的口粮，或者把口粮喂给5英尺内的生物。消耗口粮会结束当前对该生物的任何口粮效果。你所准备的任何口粮在你下一次长时休息结束时都会变成惰性。

As an action, you can expend an Exploit Die to prepare an additional Ration of your choice, though you don't regain that Exploit Die until that Ration is eaten. You can eat a Ration or feed it to a creature as part of the action used to create it.

subclassFeature.name: Dependable
entries: 你总是在那里向你的盟友伸出援助之手。
你可以采取以下特殊行动作为奖励行动。

entries.name: Administer
entries: 你将一种药水、口粮或消耗品喂给你周围5英尺内的一个自愿或无意识的生物。

entries.name: Arm
entries: 你将你携带的武器、物品或任何弹药给5英尺内的生物。然后该生物可以装备所给的物品，并以自由行动收起一件物品。

entries.name: Encourage
entries: 你采取{@action Help}行动，目标是10英尺内你选择的一个能看到或听到你的生物。

entries.name: Wrangle
entries: 你用智慧({@skill Animal Handling})或{@filter land vehicles|items|type=!treasure;!renaissance;vehicle (land);!modern;!futuristic}检查来控制你所骑的坐骑或车。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Rations
entries: 你大大提高了你准备口粮的速度。你可以在你的回合中使用一个额外的行动来制造你所选择的口粮，把它吃掉或者作为该额外行动的一部分喂给你周围5英尺内的生物。

subclassFeature.name: Ever Ready
entries: 你随时准备支持你的同伴。当你掷出主动权时，只要你不是{@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}，你就能准备好你所选择的一份口粮，而不需要消耗一个剥削模具。

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Quartermaster
entries: Your experiments with Rations have toughened your body. Your Constitution score, and maximum Constitution score, increase by 2, and you are immune to the poisoned condition.
In addition, you are always under the effects of one Ration of your choice with a duration of at least 1 minute. You can change the Ration effect at the end of each short or long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Swordsage
entries: 剑客，刀客，剑圣；将自己的生命奉献给战斗艺术的专家战士，在历史上有很多名字。剑士只有在准备杀人时才会拔出武器，只有在必要时才会杀死其他生物。剑客大师只收一个学徒，将他们所知道的一切传授给一个战士。

subclassFeature.name: Student of the Blade
entries: In your studies you have mastered skills adjacent to swordplay. You gain proficiency in Acrobatics and Performance, and whenever you would make a Charisma (Performance) check, you can choose to make a Dexterity (Performance) check instead.
Moreover, whenever you make a Dexterity (Acrobatics) or Dexterity (Performance) check that incorporates a sword you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

subclassFeature.name: Swordsage Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Battle Trance
entries: You have learned to clear your mind and enter the legendary trance that gives Swordsages their reputation. So long as you are not wearing heavy armor or wielding a shield, you can use a bonus action on to enter a Battle Trance. Your Battle Trance grants you the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: 你可以采取{@action Dash}的行动作为奖励行动。
你的护甲等级获得+1的奖励。
你在灵巧({@skill Acrobatic})检查上有优势。
每回合一次，当你使用剑术探索时，你可以掷出{@dice d4}，而不是耗费你的一个探索骰子。

entries: Your Battle Trance ends early if you are incapacitated, or if you don a shield or heavy armor. Once you enter your Battle Trance you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. If you have no uses of this feature remaining, you can expend an Exploit Die to enter a Battle Trance again.

subclassFeature.name: Heightened Reflexes
entries: You have honed your reflexes to a point in pursuit of martial perfection. You gain proficiency in Dexterity saving throws, and you add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls. Also, while you are in your Battle Trance, the bonus to your Armor Class increases by 1, for a total bonus of +2.

subclassFeature.name: Trance of the Master
entries: You have mastered the Battle Trance. When you roll initiative, so long as you are not surprised or incapacitated, you can enter a Battle Trance without expending any resources.

subclassFeature.name: Storm of Steel
entries: You become a whirlwind of deadly steel while in your Battle Trance. Once per turn while you are in a Battle Trance, you can use any Exploit that you know, rolling a d6 in place of expending one of your Exploit Dice.
At 18th level, the d6 from this feature becomes a d8.

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Swordsage
entries: You have reached the end of your journey and have become a Swordsage worthy of your own legends. When a creature you can see damages you with an attack, you can use your reaction to expend one Exploit Die, roll it, and reduce the damage you would take by twice the amount rolled.

subclassFeature.name: Tinker Knight
entries: 被称为工匠骑士的战士们寻求一种非正统的武术技能形式。他们不掌握武术技巧，而是希望通过机械发明和创新武器来增强他们的身体能力。虽然他们把大部分时间花在理论研究、修补和实验新的方案上，但工匠骑士和他们创造性的武器库在战场上是一股不可忽视的力量。

entries.name: Tinker's Knight in Your Setting
entries: 工匠骑士重视头脑而非体力。虽然这里的描述性文字描述的是齿轮和弹簧，但他们同样可以用木材、岩石、水晶、骨头、棍子和鳞片创造他们的发明。

subclassFeature.name: Analytical Mind
entries: You have spent as much time in workshops as you have in the training yard. You gain proficiency with tinker's tools and smith's tools. If you are already proficient with these tools, you gain proficiency with another set of tools of your choice.
You also learn the {@optfeature Mechanical Insight|LLAF:E} Exploit, but it does not count against your total number of Exploits Known.

subclassFeature.name: Inventive Arsenal
entries: You have invented a cacophony of wondrous modifications for your weapons, shields, and armor, known as Schematics:

entries.name: Schematics Known
entries: You know two Schematics from the list at the end of this Archetype. Some Schematics have a Fighter level prerequisite, and you can learn them at the same time that you meet that prerequisite Fighter level.
You learn one additional Schematic of your choice when you reach 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level in this class.
When you gain a level, you can replace one Schematic you know with another Schematic of your choice.

entries.name: Modifying an Object
entries: During a long rest, you can use tinker's or smith's tools to touch a number of objects equal to the number of Schematics you know, modifying each object with the effects of one of the Schematics. Each Schematic can only be used to modify one object, and one object can only be modified by the effects of one Schematic at a time. These effects last until the end of your next long rest.
In order to modify an object with a Schematic, it must meet the requirements in the Schematic's description.

entries.name: Saving Throw
entries: 如果一个图式需要蓄力，你的图式蓄力DC的计算方式如下。

subclassFeature.name: Tinker's Expertise
entries: 对于任何使用你的熟练度为{@item tinker's tools|phb|tinker's}或{@item smith's tools|phb}的能力检查，你的熟练度加成会加倍。
此外，被你的 "谋略 "修改过的物品在克服抵抗力和免疫力时也算作魔法物品，而且你可以将 "谋略 "应用于魔法武器和盔甲。

subclassFeature.name: Mechanical Synergy
entries: 你的修饰可以相互配合使用。你可以在一个物体上应用两个图式，只要该物体符合两个图式的前提条件。

subclassFeature.name: Flexible Innovation
entries: 你的创造性武器库可以调整，以满足手头的挑战。在短暂的休息结束后，你可以将一个示意图从一个物体转移到另一个物体，只要新的物体符合前提条件。如果一个图式的电荷量有限，则消耗的电荷量保持不变。
此外，你最多可以在一个物体上应用三个示意图，只要它符合所有示意图的前提条件。

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Inventions
entries: 被你的示意图改造过的武器，每应用一个示意图，其攻击和伤害卷都会获得+1的奖励，任何一套被示意图改造过的盔甲，每应用一个示意图，其护甲等级都会获得+1的奖励。
被你的谋略修改过的武器和盔甲不能获得大于+3的奖励，无论该物品在应用你的谋略之前是否有任何奖励。

subclassFeature.name: Pugilist
entries: Most often coming from the school of hard knocks, Fighters known as Pugilists learned to fight in the dark underbelly of society. Where others use tactics and practiced techniques, Pugilists rely on brute force and dirty tricks. To them, every fight is a fight for their life and they find victory at any cost.

subclassFeature.name: Contender
entries: You have learned to fight with anything that you can get your hands on. You learn one additional Fighting Style from the following list: Brawler, Improvised Fighting, or Wrestler.
You learn another Fighting Style from this list at 7th and 10th level. If you already know all three Fighting Styles, you instead learn a Fighter Fighting Style of your choice.

subclassFeature.name: Pugilist Exploits
entries: 你会在下表中提到的战士等级中学习某些特技。它们不计入你所知道的探索的总数，并且在获得一个等级后不能被转换。

subclassFeature.name: Iron Physique
entries: You have learned to take a punch better than most people. You can use your Constitution, in place of Dexterity, when calculating your Armor Class in light and medium armor.
Also, if you are not wearing any armor or wielding a shield, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

subclassFeature.name: Counter Punch
entries: You have learned to exploit every opening your foes give you. When a creature you can see misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a single unarmed strike, improvised weapon, shove, or grapple attack against it.
If you make an Athletics check as part of this reaction, you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.
Finally, your pure grit empowers your unarmed strikes and improvised weapon attacks to count as magical attacks.

subclassFeature.name: Evasive Footwork
entries: You have trained to evade your foes' strikes in combat. When you take the Attack action on your turn and make at least one unarmed strike, grapple, or shove, you can take the Dash or Disengage action in place of one of your attacks on that turn.

subclassFeature.name: Diamond Physique
entries: You have learned to take hits that would be deadly to weaker warriors. You learn the unbreakable Exploit, but it does not count against your total number of Exploits Known.
Moreover, you can use the unbreakable Exploit more than once between each long rest, however, in order to do so you must expend your Hit Dice in place of Exploit Dic

subclassFeature.name: Legendary Pugilist
entries: Your fists have become weapons of legend. When you score a critical hit with an unarmed strike and the creature has 50 hit points or fewer, you can choose to instantly reduce it to 0 hit points. Once you do so, you must finish a short or long rest before you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: Witchblade
entries: Those who walk the dark path of the Witchblade are driven by an overwhelming desire to destroy the great evils of the world. Those especially dedicated, those willing to give up anything, are often approached by Eldritch Powers, beings of otherworldly might. These benefactors offer power in return for a fraction of the warrior's soul or unquestioning fealty.

subclassFeature.name: Pact Magic
entries: 你与你的守护神达成的协议赋予了你施法的能力，就像术士那样。

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: You learn one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter Witchblade spell list|spells|subclass=Alternate Fighter: Witchblade (LLAF:E)|level=0}. Upon reaching 10th level in this class you learn one additional warlock cantrip of your choice.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Witchblade Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have, and the level of those spell slots. All of your spell slots from this feature are the same level. To cast one of your witchblade spells of 1st-level or higher, you must expend a spell slot. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: You learn two 1st-level spells of your choice from the  {@filter Witchblade spells|spells|subclass=Alternate Fighter: Witchblade (LLAF:E)}. The Spells Known column of the Witchblade Spellcasting table shows when you learn more warlock spells of 1st-level or higher. A spell you choose must be of a level no higher than what's shown in the table's Slot Level column for your level.
When you gain a level, you can choose a witchblade spell you know and replace it with another spell from the witchblade spell list, which must be of a level for which you have spell slots.

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: 魅力是你的术士法术的施法能力。每当法术提到你的法术能力时，你都会使用你的魅力，在设置蓄力DC时，以及在进行法术攻击卷时。

subclassFeature.name: Sanguine Offering
entries: 每回合一次，当你用近战武器攻击击中一个生物时，你可以消耗你的一个战士命中率作为攻击的一部分，对目标造成额外的（%0%）坏死伤害，此外还有你武器的正常伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Otherworldly Step
entries: 你可以使用长生的力量从现实的裂缝中溜走。当你使用 "第二风 "时，你可以传送到一个你能看到的无人的空间，最远可达60英尺。如果你出现在一个生物的5英尺内，你可以对它进行一次武器攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Strikes
entries: 你血液中的长生魔法会渗入你的武器攻击中。当你用武器攻击击中一个生物时，该生物在下一回合结束前对你施放的咒语进行下一次蓄力时将处于不利地位。

subclassFeature.name: Improved Sanguine Offering
entries: 你可以通过给他人造成痛苦来恢复自己的生命力。当你使用神圣献祭时，你会获得相当于对生物造成的坏死伤害的临时打击点数。
来自这个能力的临时命中率会持续一分钟，或者直到你从其他来源获得临时命中率。

subclassFeature.name: Profane Sacrifice
entries: 你可以将你的敌人的死亡提供给你的长生不老之力以增强能力。当一个生物在你30英尺范围内死亡时，作为一种反应，你可以恢复你已消耗的一个契约魔法槽，或你已消耗的命中率的百分之0。
一旦你使用这个功能，你必须完成一个短期或长期的休息，才能再次使用它。

optionalfeature.name: Archery
entries: 你在使用远程武器的攻击卷上获得+2的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Classical Swordplay
entries: While wielding a finesse weapon and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to your attack rolls and a +1 to your Armor Class so long as you are not using heavy armor or a shield.

optionalfeature.name: Defensive Fighting
entries: 在穿戴盔甲或挥舞盾牌时，你的护甲等级获得+1的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Dual Wielding
entries: 当你在双武器战斗中采取{@action Attack}行动时，你可以用你的非手武器进行一次额外的攻击，作为你行动的一部分，而不是你的额外行动，在这次攻击的伤害上加上你的能力修饰值

optionalfeature.name: Dueling
entries: 当你单手挥舞近战武器而没有其他武器时，你使用它的伤害卷获得+2的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Featherweight Fighting
entries: 当你只挥舞轻型武器而不使用其他武器时，你的速度增加10英尺。只要你没有穿戴中型或重型盔甲，或者没有挥舞盾牌，你还会获得使用轻武器的伤害卷的+1奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries: Whenever you make an attack with a heavy melee weapon as part of your Attack action, you can treat a total roll of 5 or lower on the weapon's damage dice as a 6. You must be wielding the weapon with two hands.

optionalfeature.name: Improvised Fighting
entries: 你获得对简易武器的熟练度。每回合一次，当你用简易武器攻击时，你可以掷两次伤害骰子，取较高的骰子。当你这样做时，简易武器会被摧毁，不能再用于进一步的攻击。你不能使用这个功能来摧毁魔法物品。

optionalfeature.name: Melee Marksman
entries: 在你5英尺范围内有一个敌对的生物，不会对你的远程武器攻击造成劣势，只要你攻击的是5英尺范围内的生物。
当你对5英尺内的生物进行远程武器攻击时，你可以使用你的额外行动，用你的远程武器对其进行近战攻击。一旦命中，你会造成相当于{@dice 1d4}+你力量修正值的破坏性伤害。

optionalfeature.name: Protector
entries: When a creature you can see attacks you, or a target within 5 feet, you can use your reaction to add your proficiency bonus to the target's Armor Class against that attack. You must be wielding a shield or a melee weapon to gain this benefit.

optionalfeature.name: Strongbow
entries: You can use your Strength modifier, in place of Dexterity, for attack and damage rolls with longbows and shortbows. When you do so, you gain a +1 to damage rolls with those weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
entries: 你可以拔出具有投掷属性的武器，作为你使用该武器进行攻击的一部分。此外，当你使用投掷武器进行远程武器攻击时，你在该攻击的伤害卷上获得+2的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Brawler
entries: Your unarmed strikes deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier on hit. If you have two free hands and use your action to make only unarmed strikes you can make a single unarmed strike as a bonus action on that turn.

optionalfeature.name: Versatile Fighting
entries: While wielding a single versatile weapon and no shield, you gain a +1 bonus to your attack rolls with that weapon. While doing so, you can also use your bonus action to make a single grapple or shove attack, or to take the Use an Object action.

optionalfeature.name: Blind Warrior
entries: You have blindsight with a range in feet equal to 5 times your proficiency bonus. In that range, you can see invisible targets and anything that isn't behind total cover or hidden from you.

optionalfeature.name: Heavyweight Fighting
entries: You can use your weight, and the weight of your weapon, to land devastating blows. While you are wielding a heavy weapon, you gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls and you have advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to Shove.

optionalfeature.name: Mariner
entries: 当你没有穿戴中型或重型盔甲，或使用盾牌时，你的游泳速度等于你的步行速度，并获得你的护甲等级+1的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Mountaineer
entries: 当你没有穿戴中型或重型盔甲，或使用盾牌时，你的攀爬速度等于你的移动速度，并且你获得你的护甲等级+1的奖励。

optionalfeature.name: Mounted Warrior
entries: While you are riding a controlled mount, both you and your mount gain a +1 bonus to your Armor Class, and you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to command the mount to take one action from its stat block.

optionalfeature.name: Pit Fighting
entries: 你已经训练过使用通常与角斗士有关的武器作战，赋予你以下好处。

items: 对你来说，{@item trident|PHB|tridents}在击中时造成{@dice 1d8}({@dice 1d10})的穿刺伤害。
当用{@item net|PHB}对5英尺内的生物进行攻击卷时，你在卷上没有劣势。
当你在你的回合中采取{@action Attack}行动时，用{@item net|PHB}进行攻击只能代替一次攻击。

optionalfeature.name: Shield Warrior
entries: You gain proficiency with shields as a martial melee weapon, and on hit, your shield deals 2d4 bludgeoning damage. If you are wielding a shield and nothing else, you gain a +1 bonus to your shield attack rolls and to your Armor Class.

optionalfeature.name: Standard Bearer
entries: 当你周围5英尺内的生物对你能看到的生物进行攻击时，你可以在他们的攻击卷上给予他们优势作为反应。你必须手里拿着旗帜、旗子或标准才能使用这个反应。

optionalfeature.name: Wrestler
entries: When you hit a creature with a melee attack on your turn, you can use a bonus action on that turn to attempt to grapple or shove that creature, so long as you have a free hand to do so. Also, you can drag grappled creatures up to your full speed.

optionalfeature.name: Beguiling Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and be charmed by a creature of your choice that it can see until the start of your next turn. This charm effect ends early if you or your allies attack the charmed creature, damage it in any way, or force it to make a saving throw.
Starting at 7th level, the creature also takes half as much psychic damage on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Bursting Shot
entries: The creature and any other creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on Dexterity saving throw or they take your choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die.
Starting at 7th level, the creatures also take half as much damage of the type you chose on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Enfeebling Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take necrotic damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die, and for 1 minute, the damage of its weapon attacks is halved. The creature can repeat this saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending this effect on a success.
Starting at 7th level, the creature also takes half as much necrotic damage on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Grasping Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take poison damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and become wrapped in thorns for 1 minute. While wrapped in thorns, its speed is halved, and the first time it moves on its turn without teleporting it takes piercing damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die. A creature can use its action to make a Strength check, removing the thorns on a success.
Starting at 7th level, the creature also takes half as much poison damage when it succeeds on the initial saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Piercing Shot
entries: The creature, and any creature directly behind it in a straight line out to 30 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die.
Starting at 7th level, the creatures also take half as much force damage on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Seeking Shot
entries: In place of an attack, you can use this Enchanted Shot to cause a piece of ammunition to fly from a ranged weapon you are holding and magically seek out a creature within range of that weapon that you have seen within the past minute. There must be a path that the ammunition can follow to hit it. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and you instantly learn its current location.
Starting at 7th level, it also half as much force damage on a successful saving throw, but you do not learn its location.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take psychic damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and be surrounded by visual hallucinations, blinding it for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each turn, ending this effect on a success.
Starting at 7th level, the creature also takes half as much damage psychic damage on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Banishing Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished to a harmless demiplane for 1 minute. On each of its turns while it is banished, the creature can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. When it ends, it reappears in the space that it was banished from, or if that space is occupied, the closest unoccupied space.

optionalfeature.name: Severing Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and be unable to cast spells for 1 minute. The creature can repeat this saving throw at the start of each turn, ending the effect on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Technical Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or suffer the effects of one Marital Exploit you know. You can use this Enchanted Shot to deliver the effects of Exploits that normally require a you to hit with a melee weapon attack.

optionalfeature.name: Transporting Shot
entries: The creature must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and instantly switch places with you. Neither you nor the target provoke opportunity attacks with this movement. Creatures take half as much force damage on a successful saving throw.

optionalfeature.name: Cloud Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the wily and deceptive magic of Cloud Giants. You learn the {@optfeature subtle con|LLAF} Exploit.

When you or a creature you can see within 30 feet is targeted by an attack roll, you can use a reaction to invoke this Rune and force the attacker to target another creature of your choice within range of its attack. You cannot cause the attacker to attack itself.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the craftsmanship of the Fire Giants. When you make a check with a tool set you gain a bonus to your roll equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can invoke this Rune to conjure molten restraints. It must succeed on a Strength saving throw or it takes fire damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die and becomes {@condition restrained} for 1 minute. It can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking fire damage equal to two rolls of your Exploit Die on a failure, and escaping on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Frost Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the savage instincts and intuition of the Frost Giants. You learn the {@optfeature cunning instinct|LLAF} Exploit.

As a bonus action, you can invoke this Rune to empower your physicality and endurance. For the next 10 minutes, you gain a bonus to all Strength and Constitution ability checks and saving throws equal to one roll of your Exploit Die.

optionalfeature.name: Hill Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the stubborn and resilient magic of the Hill Giants. You learn the {@optfeature brace up|LLAF} Exploit.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can invoke this Rune to gain resistance to all bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute. Moreover, when you use Runic Might, you can invoke this Rune as part of that same bonus action.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the esoteric and dreamlike magic of the Stone Giants. You learn the {@optfeature inquisitive eye|LLAF} Exploit.

When a creature ends its turn within 30 feet of you, you can use a reaction to invoke this Rune and force it to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it descends into a waking dream, is incapacitated, and has a speed of 0 for 1 minute. It can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending these effects on a successful save.

optionalfeature.name: Storm Rune
entries: This Rune is imbued with the prophetic and wise magic of the Storm Giants. You learn the {@optfeature scholarly recall|LLAF} Exploit.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can enter a prophetic state that lasts for 1 minute or until you are incapacitated. For the duration, when you or a creature you can see within 30 feet makes an ability check, attack roll, or a saving throw, you can use your reaction to add or subtract one roll of your Exploit Die from the roll. You can use this reaction after the creature rolls, but before you know if it succeeds or fails.

optionalfeature.name: Commanding Presence
entries: When you make a Charisma (Persuasion) or Charisma (Intimidation) check you can expend one Exploit Die, roll it, and add the result to your ability check. You can do so after you roll the d20, but before you know if you succeed. Also, whenever you would make a Charisma (Intimidation) check, you can make a Strength (Intimidation) check instead.

optionalfeature.name: Eloquent Speech
entries: Whenever you would normally make a Charisma (Deception) or Charisma (Persuasion) check, you can choose to use your Intelligence in place of Charisma for that ability check.
